entries: 洛思以极端残忍和虐待而闻名。她喜欢给予痛苦并在心理上折磨她的猎物，从中获得极大的快感。在极少数情况下，她会陷入战斗，但她会先和对手玩弄，给予他们虚假的希望，让他们以为有机会击败她，然后迅速扭转局势，揭示她从未真正陷入困境。她会优先攻击那些被所有人所喜爱的目标，这样她就可以在其缓慢杀死目标的过程中陶醉于他们的痛苦，而其他受害者则无助地目睹这一切。

entries.name: Deadly Foe
entries: 作为一位女神，洛思非常强大，在战斗时不需要武器。她通常会召唤她忠诚的女仆，或者{@creature yochlol||yochlols}，以及选择高级黑暗精灵仆从来为她战斗。洛思依靠她的施法能力来迷惑对手，并将他们困在她坚如钢铁的网中。她的每条腿都可以用作矛，可以轻松地刺穿生物，同时她还可以用带有毒液的毒牙进行致命攻击。

entries.name: Lolth's Lair
entries: Lolth的住所是一个危险的领域，被称为（Demonweb Pits）（恶魔网坑）。有许多方法可以进入第66层深渊，那里是（Demonweb）（恶魔网）的领域，但要离开可能是最大的问题。（Demonweb）（恶魔网）是一团深渊、岩石峡谷、隧道和路径的混合体，从各个方向延伸，到处都是蜘蛛网、陷阱和饥饿的居民。由于Lolth在纺织蜘蛛网时不断改变路径，因此没有人能够绘制这个类似迷宫的位面地图。

整个（恶魔之网）(Demonweb) 都是艰难的地形，任何试图穿越其布满蛛网的隧道的生物都需要小心，以免被困在任何蛛网中，否则它们将成为洛思（Lolth）的信徒的食物。深渊（The Pit）位于恶魔之网的底部，是洛思占据的黑暗洞穴。整个洞穴都点缀着蓝色火炬，散布在众多壁龛中。厚厚的蛛网覆盖着每一个角落，也在地板上形成了天然的地毯，使得除了蜘蛛和蜘蛛亲属之外的所有人行走更加困难。在洞穴的中央是洛思的王座，就在一个用于祭祀的石坛后面。王座后面是一扇镶金的门，通过这扇门可以通往不同的位面和地点。

monsterFluff.name: Loremaster
entries: 博学者是专精于理解魔法运作的多才多艺的巫师。大多数是巫师学者，但也有少数人成为雇佣兵或冒险家，以赚取资金来支持他们的研究。
博学者可以改变和调整一个法术的机制，无论是切换其能量类型还是它如何显现和影响目标。

monsterFluff.name: Mageslayer
entries: 灭法者是战士术士，他们接受过训练以对付和击败施法者。他们的奥术技能包括对抗和驱散敌人魔法的法术。此外，他们的武器攻击可以干扰敌人的专注力。

items.name: Marut Concordant
entries: 协约者是为了执行由{@creature marut|MPMM}接受和强加的破裂合同而被创造的。与合同持有者一样，协约者不考虑事情的灰色地带，只专注于书面内容——无论其含义是善是恶。协约者是坚定不移的存在，会穿越维度和平面追捕违约者，直到能用他们的雷鸣之拳实现正义。

items.name: Marut Guard
entries: 在锡基尔城内外驻扎着马鲁特卫兵。这些卫兵比典型的{@creature marut|MPMM}构造体要小，他们手持一把{@item greatsword|phb}，主要用于制止派系内部争斗并保卫和谐大厅免受侵犯。有时，马鲁特卫兵会被派遣去陪同{@creature marut concordant|mme2-v2|marut concordants}执行任务，尤其是当他们被指示捕捉并带回违约者时。

monsterFluff.name: Mastermind
entries: 一个主谋是一个精明、狡诈的策略家，不断影响、策划和操纵。它把每个人都视为可以利用和牺牲以实现目标的棋子。除非相信自己占据优势，否则它绝不会自愿参与战斗，而且观察力和洞察力极强。它能识别敌人的弱点，并立即制定利用这些弱点的战略。

monsterFluff.name: Maur (Hunched Giant)
entries: 马尔斯（Maurs）, 也被称为驼背巨人, 据传是{@creature storm giant||storm giants}的退化近亲，数百万年前被困在地底深处的地下世界。地下生活中的恶劣、狭窄和狭窄空间使它们变成了驼背、驼肩的滑稽模仿者，它们的皮肤和头发苍白。除非有足够的空间站立，这些15英尺高的巨人总是驼背着，用手指关节拖地。

entries.name: Unfurled Might
entries: Maurs（玛尔）装备着石甲和石制武器，并通过在皮肤上刻上符文来装饰自己。他们通常通过融入石头来设下伏击，等待他们预定的目标经过，然后用他们的石头{@item warhammer|phb}发动突袭。如果面对强大的敌人并且周围有足够大的空间，他们可以展开身体，伸展并站立起来，这个过程被认为是极度痛苦的。一旦完全直立，Maurs能够更好地发挥他们的力量和法术能力到最大潜力。然而，由于他们进化的生理结构，他们无法长时间保持直立的姿势，必须尽快返回到驼背的形态。

entries.name: Symbiotic Giants
entries: Maurs只在地下世界中遇到，除非被迫，否则永远不会离开。它们很少以大群出现，由于体型的挑战，它们会与更小型的智慧种族如{@creature duergar}、{@creature grimlock||grimlocks}、{@creature deep gnome (svirfneblin)||svirfneblin}和{@creature troglodyte||troglodytes}建立共生关系，作为守卫换取食物和财宝。

items.name: Meazel Assassin
entries: {@creature meazel|MPMM|Meazels}以卓越的狡诈和武艺成为雇佣刺客，经常向来自暗影界的聪明生物，如沙达凯(shadar-kai)，提供他们的服务。

entries.name: Dark Ambushers
entries: 梅泽刺客利用阴影，利用他们的传送能力从黑暗中出现和消失，似乎突然袭击。

items.name: Meazel Shadow Mage
entries: 拥有掌握黑暗本质的能力，(Meazel)暗影法师可以编织致命的暗影魔法。他们可以发射强大的墨黑色抛射物，一旦击中生物，就能腐蚀肉体并导致失明。他们还可以创造伸出并覆盖大面积的暗影触须。处于该区域内的人会遭受死灵伤害，可能还会陷入虚弱状态。

items.name: Meazel Thug
entries: 有些{@creature meazel|MPMM|meazels}是聚集在一起组成团伙的暴徒，目的是为了人多势众。这样他们就可以成功地袭击团体，而不仅仅是单个目标。
通常会雇佣米佐尔(Mezel)暴徒来暗杀或绑架特定目标。在这种情况下，这些暴徒会试图制造分散注意力、与任何卫兵交战、转移注意力并制造混乱，然后抓住目标并将其带回至暗影界(Shadowfell)。

items.name: Meenlock Corruptor
entries: 缈魔侵蚀者乐此不疲地在心理上折磨猎物。这些扭曲的精灵充分利用他们的可怖联系和腐化思维能力，诅咒目标使其易受进一步的精神攻击。他们会对大群体使用敌人环伴法术，对较小的群体使用支配人类法术。

items.name: Meenlock Elder
entries: 这位鱼人族长是一位更年长且更强大的存在。它了解更多的灵能法术，可以用来折磨敌人，并有能力迫使敌人互相攻击。

items.name: Meenlock Stalker
entries: 邪眼潜行者是一名非凡的追踪者。它使用心灵穿刺来追踪猎物，并利用黑暗和暗影潜行来避免被察觉。当它最终找到理想的伏击时机时，它会先使用疯狂思绪来震慑目标，然后用它的利爪撕裂并使其麻痹。

梅菲斯托菲勒斯（Mephistopheles）, 卡尼亚之主，是地狱第八层的大公爵。梅菲斯托菲勒斯沉浸于研究和获取知识之中，已经花费了无数个千年来研究奥术魔法。他广泛的研究吸引了其他大公爵的注意，尤其是第二层的主宰迪斯帕特（Dispater）, 现在经常派遣使者前往卡尼亚，以防梅菲斯托菲勒斯偶然发现对迪斯之主有用的新知识。梅菲斯托菲勒斯桌上最重要的研究是地狱火魔法。虽然他是唯一掌握地狱火魔法的人，但梅菲斯托菲勒斯愿意将这种力量传授给有影响力的人和忠实的追随者，以建立并加强他的教众。

entries.name: Irritable Lord
entries: 表面上，他拥有着像受过良好教育和老练绅士那样的冷静举止。但作为阿斯莫德斯（Asmodeus）地狱九王之一的首席巫师，梅菲斯托菲勒斯（Mephistopheles）却是一个不耐烦且毫不宽容的存在，经常会杀死他认为是干扰或讨厌的手下和其他生物。梅菲斯托菲勒斯身高超过9英尺，皮肤呈红色，肌肉发达，长着皮翼，两只弯曲的巨大角，长发黑发，黄色眼睛，他的外表就是人类所认知的传统恶魔形象。他身披一件长黑披风，总是携带他的长戟，一把凶猛的三叉戟，通过它他可以释放地狱火魔法。

entries.name: Cania
entries: 梦想前往卡尼亚的冒险者们需要在这里严寒的气温中生存。在没有任何保护的情况下，任何生物暴露在卡尼亚严酷的天气中都会在几秒钟内冻死。梅菲斯托菲勒斯选择保持整个卡尼亚层处于冰冷的温度和冰风暴中，以阻止不受欢迎的访客。任何希望访问卡尼亚的人都需要获得梅菲斯托菲勒斯本人签署的书面批准，这份批准赋予访客抵御寒冷天气的保护，但也使他们受梅菲斯托菲勒斯的《禁令之言》约束。大多数访客都是忠诚的崇拜者和强大的巫师，他们希望在梅菲斯托菲勒斯手下学习或向他提供新知识。这些不幸的访客很快发现自己成为了这位八之领主的宠物，并不情愿地被束缚在一份合同中，被迫永远在卡尼亚的广阔图书馆和研究实验室中辛勤劳作。

entries.name: Mephistopheles's Lair
entries: 梅菲斯塔堡（Mephistar）是梅菲斯托菲勒斯（Mephistopheles）的庄园。坐落在卡尼亚（Cania）最高点之上，被冰川环绕，梅菲斯塔堡是八领主的主要实验室。整个堡垒比卡尼亚还要寒冷，堡垒的居民，大多是学者、贤者和巫师，已经学会不要触摸墙壁，以免立刻冻结他们的肢体。然而，这种设计并非是为了惩罚居民。梅菲斯塔堡被降至冰点以下的温度，以便支撑梅菲斯托菲勒斯的地狱之火实验。一些容纳最强烈地狱之火实验的区域已经开始融化，并在地板上形成冰池。尽管对居民来说这些冰池微不足道，但天真的游荡者和入侵者可能会发现自己被冻结在冰冷的水池中，或者死于体温过低。

魔法师梅菲斯托菲勒斯的巢穴走廊两旁布满各种口和隐藏的洞口，不时喷发地狱火。其他人可能会把这视为陷阱，但梅菲斯托菲勒斯只是为了自己的娱乐而设计的。在他的巢穴中央，梅菲斯托菲勒斯坐在一个慢慢融化的宝座上，周围是一道冰水"护城河"。房间的温度会根据梅菲斯托菲勒斯的心情而改变。希望击败八之领主的冒险者们将不得不在与梅菲斯托菲勒斯战斗时应对极端的炎热和寒冷。这位大公爵是一位大法师，可以随心所欲地从身体散发出地狱火的光环。作为真正的地狱火大师，梅菲斯托菲勒斯可以仅凭凝视就用地狱火将对手灰飞烟灭。虽然梅菲斯托菲勒斯拥有所有这些力量，但他认为战斗是微不足道的，会让他的部下和他召唤出来的{@creature ice devil||ice devils}为他战斗。

monsterFluff.name: Mohrg
entries: 那些对生命充满强烈仇恨且死后未能赎罪的连环杀手和大规模杀人犯引起了{@creature Orcus|MPMM}，即亡灵之王，的注意。这些邪恶的灵魂被这位恶魔颁赐了不死之身，并化身为莫赫格，继续他们对杀戮的热情。

entries.name: Supernatural Strength
entries: 一只莫格（mohrg）看起来几乎是一个骨瘦如柴的人类尸体，胸腔里露出令人作呕的扭曲器官和内脏。它移动速度惊人，力量超乎寻常，往往因此而让受害者措手不及。

entries.name: Cunning Sadist
entries: 尽管外表看起来，魔尔格（mohrg）并非一个无意识的不死生物。它狡猾且享受折磨和杀害受害者的变态快感。它甚至会与猎物交谈，用描述如何慢慢折磨和活生生地肢解它来折磨它。

monsterFluff.name: Monster Slayer
entries: 正义取向的怪物猎人是专门追捕夜间生物和黑暗魔法使用者的猎人。他们追捕不死生物、恶魔、邪恶仙灵和其他邪恶威胁，因为他们认为这些威胁对自然界构成威胁。他们经常出现在荒凉的地方、荒野边界和文明边缘，以便提供他们的服务。
邪恶怪物猎人追捕任何超自然威胁，比如吟游诗人，圣骑士，牧师，术士和术士，以及任何不自然的种族，比如魔鬼和天使血统者。他们经常被雇佣为赏金猎人或刺客，以对付魔法威胁，比如一队冒险者。

items.name: MonstrousCatoblepas
entries: 冒险者们会感觉到一种极其不对劲的感觉，当他们在沼泽中漫步了数英里却没有遇到任何生命迹象。当一只没有已知天敌的卡托布雷帕斯(Catoblepas)被单独留在那里数十年来吃尸体，它会长到巨大的体积，并在其自然栖息地数英里内消灭各种野兽和人形生物。

items.name: Monstrous Cave Fisher
entries: 这种极为罕见的怪物只能在地底深处最深的地方找到，那里有广阔的洞穴，这种巨大的洞穴渔夫长约25英尺。这种可怕的捕食者通常猎食土狼和类似大小的猎物。

items.name: Monstrous Flail Snail
entries: 如果一个普通的{@creature flail snail|MPMM}被任由其自由生长并吞噬所遇到的一切，它可能会变成巨大的怪物。这种怪物——巨大的连枷蜗牛，在不幸位于其路径上的村庄和小镇可能构成威胁，因为它可以长到正常大小的三倍大。
一个巨大的连枷蜗牛(`flail snail`)的触手非常强大，如果一个生物被它们击中多次，就会被震晕。

items.name: Monstrous Slithering Tracker
entries: 数个怀有复仇之心的生物自愿参与仪式，诞生了一个庞大的、滑动的追踪者。这些结合在一起的身体最终形成了一个不自然巨大的{@creature slithering tracker|MPMM}。

items: Often mistaken for an {@creature earth elemental}, the mud golem is a magical construct created for its amorphous nature and ability to appear as natural heaps of mud, making it ideal as an inconspicuous guardian in outdoor settings, such as a wizard's courtyard or garden.

entries.name: Sticky Body
entries: A mud golem is a bane to weapon-wielding foes as any melee weapon that strikes the construct's body can become stuck fast if the attacker is not strong enough to pull it back out. Any creature caught by the golem's powerful limbs will soon find themselves getting smothered to death within the mud golem's body.

items: Great old masters are huge, bloated {@creature neogi|MPMM} at the end of their life cycle, having been injected with toxins by other {@creature neogi|MPMM}. They have lost the ability to enslave other creatures. In very rare cases, however, instead of the great old master becoming helpless, the toxin instead slowly transforms the creature into a feral, egg-infested abomination with renewed unnatural strength.

entries.name: Unleash Hatchlings
entries: In combat, it relies primarily on brute might, tearing its foes with its toothy maw and claws. When faced with overwhelming numbers, it can pop and spawn the hatchlings from its body. These hatchlings immediately swarm nearby foes and distract them from the real threat.

items: Exceptional{@creature neogi master|MPMM|neogi masters} that survive long enough eventually grow to become overlords. These merciless taskmasters lead the savage {@creature neogi|MPMM} as they travel through the Astral Plane, searching for more slaves and treasure.
No creature is spared of the Overlord's cruelty, as even other {@creature neogi|MPMM|neogis} fall under its ruthless command, forcing them to perform actions on the battlefield.

A nightcrawler at first glance resembles a nightmarish purple worm but is jet black in color and oozes an insidious presence. It is one of the mightiest undead creatures that ever existed. Its giant coiled body constantly emits a shadowy aura that causes living organisms to rot and decay.

entries.name: Ambush Burrowers
entries: The nightcrawler normally burrows underground and attacks from underneath its prey. Its huge maw, which is lined with rows of long, sharp teeth, bursts from the ground and tries to swallow its target whole. Creatures rarely survive this initial horrific assault and those that do still have to contend with the nightcrawler's Finger of Doom and Annihilating Aura.

items: The nightprowler is the most common and weakest type of nightshade. Yet it will still pose a threat to most mortals due to its deadly traits.

The nightprowler resembles a creature that has a vaguely humanoid upper body and a lower body of a large feline. It has a single eye at the center of its otherwise featureless face, and shadowy mist-like tendrils constantly swirl around its body.

entries.name: Nightshades
entries: 夜影是极其强大的不死生物，它们寻求摧毁一切生命。它们原产于负面位面，偶尔也会潜伏在暗影界中。可怕的{@creature nightwalker|MPMM}是一种夜影。

items: A nightwing resembles a giant shadowy bat with a wingspan of 40 feet. Black mists can be seen trailing from its body as it scours the skies of the Negative Plane constantly looking for prey.
The nightwing attacks by performing hit-and-run tactics, swooping in to make a quick bite and flying again before giving the victim a chance to retaliate.

According to legend, the nuckelavee was once a powerful champion of good that fell in battle against the forces of the demon prince {@creature Orcus|MPMM}. As punishment, the champion and its steed are transformed by the Demon Prince of Undeath into a demon. This is partially true. {@creature deathpriest of orcus|mme2-v2|Deathpriests of Orcus} perform an unholy ritual where they sacrifice, willing or otherwise, a {@creature knight} and its {@creature riding horse||steed} to the demon lord. A mighty abyssal fiend is summoned and uses the sacrifice as its vessel. Both man and steed are then fused together in an agonizing ritual that brings forth the nuckelavee—a fiendish abomination whose horrifying visage can bring unending nightmares to those that gaze upon it. The resulting appearance—crimson ropy muscles visible through translucent skin, black blood coursing through yellow veins, an equine skull jutting from its midsection—is horrific.

entries.name: Amphibious Fiend
entries: While it may be a fiend, the amphibious nuckelavee is normally encountered in the Material Plane, wading in dismal watery places such as fog-filled bogs and marshlands.

entries.name: Bringer of Woe
entries: Like all servants of {@creature Orcus|MPMM}, the nuckelavee is devoid of its heart, and its once righteous spirit has been replaced with a desire for death and destruction—all for the glory of the demon prince of undeath. It now serves as a terrifying herald of {@creature Orcus|MPMM}. Some say that when someone a nuckelavee is sighted, disease, drought, and pestilence shall soon follow.

entries.name: Champion of Undeath
entries: The nuckelavee's entire being seethes with necrotic energy. Its very presence instantly kills nearby animal and plant life, leaving only death and decay at its wake. It is not surprising then that it can be found in the company of undead, even serving them as their leader.

entries.name: Baleful Weapons
entries: In combat, the nuckelavee can be a deadly opponent that should not be underestimated. Its potent breath can instantly cause flesh and bone to rot, and its dreaded claws can cause instant death to those who are foolish enough to challenge it.

items.name: Ogre Champion of Grolantor
entries: 有少数{@creature ogre||ogres}崇拜{@deity Grolantor|nonhuman}，将自己视为{@creature hill giant||hill giants}的平等。出于某种未知原因，这位神似乎听取了他们的祈祷。他们的勇士可以施展魔法，发出一声对任何比{@creature ogre}更小的生物都令人恐惧的咆哮。

items.name: Ogre Monarch
entries: 食人魔君主统治着其领土内所有{@creature ogre}部落。它是一个令人畏惧和野蛮的人物，通过杀戮一路上位。尽管它的野蛮本性，但对于其种族来说，它非常狡猾，被所有臣民所敬畏和崇敬。
在战斗中目睹食人魔君主的强大的人都会在战斗中变得更加勇敢。而所有直接受其指示的人都会不由自主地恐慌，并尽力遵循它的命令。

items.name: Ogre Vanguard
entries: 很少有人{@creature ogre||ogres}接受过比兽皮更重的盔甲训练。食人魔先锋是其中之一。这种生物经常出现在{@creature hobgoblin}的军队中，可以看到它在最前线，咆哮着，嘟囔着，试图吸引敌人的注意力。然后它冲锋上前，用自己的{@item greatsword|phb}在敌人阵线中穿行，劈开尸体。那些敢于逃跑或脱离战斗的人会遭到它快速而严厉的打击。

items: Normally only humanoids can be afflicted with lycanthropy. However, there have been a few rare cases where giants, for some unknown reason or fluke, become cursed after suffering a bite from a werecreature. The ogre wererat is such an example. To the {@creature ogre}, the curse has become a gift. The transformation has given it more resistance and stamina, acute senses, cunning, and agility. Unfortunately, it now also has an insatiable appetite for flesh.
An ogre wererat can sometimes be found in the company of other {@creature wererat||wererats} and serves as their muscle.

items.name: Ogre Witch Doctor
entries: 大多数食人魔巫医都是崇拜瓦普拉克的神圣施法者。他们经常担任更强大的{@creature ogre}，如{@creature ogre chieftain|MonsterManualExpanded|chieftain}的领袖或顾问。他们随同战队出征以提供支援，并以赋予瓦普拉克的恩赐而受人重视，这种恩赐可以让生物暂时恢复伤口和残肢。

items.name: Orc Conqueror
entries: 很少有{@creature orc||orcs}成为他们部落的冠军。而更少的人会成为为神明服务的邪恶骑士。这些是那些经历了无数战斗和考验的特殊人物，他们被磨练成了无情的暴君，领导着他们的兽人同胞们以神的名义袭击和摧毁敌人的定居点。

entries.name: Will-Destroying Attacks
entries: 受到他们的神祇祝福和青睐，这些征服者可以释放神圣法术，并赋予他们的武器死灵能量，以打击他们的敌人。任何被他们的武器击中的生物都会被恐惧所困扰，并且由于他们的超自然光环，无法远离半兽人。
征服者很可能是任何{@creature orc}部落的最高领导者。如果不是，他们相信他们肯定会成为。(Conquerors)

items.name: Orc Doom Hand of Yurtrus
entries: 当一个{@creature orc hand of yurtrus|VGM|Hand of Yurtrus}通过了众多的神的考验，并通过牺牲无数敌人的生命证明了自己的价值，最终会成为{@deity Yurtrus|orc|VGM}的末日之手，一个强大但可怕的祭司。

entries.name: Corrupted Form
entries: 虽然{@creature orc}被赋予更强大的法术，但也受到了诅咒。{@creature orc||orc's}的皮肤可怕地变形，变成了一个充满脓液和疖子的皮囊，不断分泌毒素。不知何故，{@creature orc}本身却毫发无伤，但任何试图触碰它的人都会暴露于一种剧毒之中。然而，{@creature orc}并不将其视为诅咒，反而欢迎它作为自己真正的自然状态，即{@creature orc hand of yurtrus|VGM|Hand of Yurtrus}。

items.name: Orc Great Eye of Gruumsh
entries: 一个在战斗中证明自己并为其神杀死许多敌人的{@creature orc eye of gruumsh||Eye of Gruumsh}最终成为了{@deity Gruumsh|orc|VGM}的大眼睛。这位强大的战士牧师可以用长矛攻击两次，并施放更强大的神圣法术。除了这些新特性外，格鲁姆什的大眼睛还可以向敌人的眼睛喷射有毒唾液，暂时使他们失明。

items.name: Orc King
entries: 强大的兽人王是一个引人注目的形象，身穿{@item plate armor|phb}，手持{@item greatsword|phb}。它骑着个人战兽——通常是一只大型{@creature dire wolf}或{@creature boar}——指挥着它的部落向敌人释放地狱之怒。兽人王的存在本身就能在战斗中激励附近的兽人。然而，兽人王不仅仅是一个强大的指挥官。它是一名强大而野蛮的战士，可以用武器攻击三次，并发出战斗呐喊，让盟友陷入战斗狂热，或者让敌人心生恐惧。

items.name: Orc Mauler
entries: 一名兽人重击手是一个异常庞大的野蛮人，即使按兽人的标准来看也是如此。它的力量如此强大，以至于 {@creature orc||orc's} 造成的致命打击也能够凹陷或摧毁盔甲和盾牌。

items.name: Orc Sharpshooter
entries: 兽人神射手是精通箭术、瞄准无误的大师。幸运的是，只有少数{@creature orc||orcs}达到了这种弓箭技能水平。

items.name: Orc Vanguard
entries: 大多数{@creature orc||orcs}更喜欢穿着轻型或中型盔甲，并对穿着重型盔甲感到不满，因为它会让他们感到受限。然而，一名兽人先锋却将其视为必要，以便能够避开可能袭击的大多数打击。这是一种必然，因为兽人先锋的角色是站在冲锋军队的最前线，吸引敌人的注意力，远离其脆弱的盟友。

items.name: Orc War Chanter
entries: {@creature orc||orcs}中很少有人学习吟游诗人的艺术，但那些学习的几乎总是成为战歌吟游者。虽然他们仍然可以像大多数{@creature orc}战士一样野蛮战斗，但他们真正的价值在于战斗中演奏他们的战歌时展现出来。这些战歌使他们能够让任何能听到的敌人感到恐惧，激励盟友陷入战斗狂热，或者鼓舞盟友。

items.name: Orc War Priest of Ilneval
entries: 当一个{@creature orc blade of Ilneval|VGM}已经证明了自己对{@deity Ilneval|orc|VGM|god}的价值，它将被赋予神圣的能力。它现在成为了一名战争牧师，能够施放法术，要么是为了补充和增强它的战斗技能，要么是为了在敌人的阵营中造成混乱。它的命令在战场上回荡，任何听到它的兽人都会迅速跟随，知道它所下达的命令都是由兽人战神的智慧指引的。

items: A paeliryon is a greater devil that does its work unseen. This devil believes that information is the key to advancing in power and as such, is responsible for the spy and assassin networks that rivals even {@creature lolth|mme2-v2|Lolth's}.

The paeliryon is a disgusting sight to behold, with a massive bloated obese body covered in warts. Its massive face is framed by a devious, red-lipped smile that prominently shows its rows of sharp teeth. On its back sprouts two bat-like wings with ends flayed like old leather and its hands are armed with poisoned claws painted in blood red.

entries.name: Out of the dark
entries: Paeliryons rarely come out in the open, preferring to leave its agents to do the dirty work. When a paeliryon does come out, it means the plan has gone wrong, or an opponent has piqued its interest. Few rarely see this happen, and even fewer survive, for paeliryons are incredibly powerful spellcasters that rival even some of the demon lords of the Nine Hells.

items: Palrethees were ambitious lesser demons that aspired to become greater ones but failed in some unknown trial that destroyed their original forms. They now appear as tall, emaciated humanoids with vestigial wings protruding from their back and hot flames enshrouding their entire bodies. They can control the appearance of their flames, turning them from searing blue, translucent and ghostly, or bright fiery orange. Palrethees often serve as captains to lesser demons or as attendants to greater demons, such as a {@creature balor}.

entries.name: Flaming Warrior
entries: In combat, palrethees can be difficult opponents due to their constant body flames. A mere touch or striking them with a melee weapon can cause severe burns. For offense, they rely mostly on their martial abilities, cutting down foes with their flaming greatsword. If faced with a large number of foes, palrethees will cast {@spell fear}.

items: Passion devils were created by the archdevil Fierna in her likeness and image, and are therefore both strikingly beautiful and terrifying. While the passion devils serve Fierna officially as ambassadors to the courts of other archdevils or dukes of the Nine Hells, their true purpose is to infiltrate enemy ranks and spy on other devils.

entries.name: Emotional Manipulators
entries: Passion devils rarely engage in combat and instead use their powers of domination, manipulation, and seduction to meet their objectives. If forced into a fight it does not like, it will use its spells and abilities to sow just enough confusion and discord for it to escape.
Passion devils rarely travel alone, and are often accompanied by {@creature bearded devil||bearded devils} that serve them as bodyguards.

items: At first glance, the piscoloth resembles a 6-foot-tall humanoid crustacean. It has the tough, chitinous body of a lobster, muscular arms that end in large crab-like pincers, fish-like tails, and legs that end in talons. Its head is similar to that of a cuttlefish, with bulging eyes and short tentacles writhing from its maw. A piscoloth's shell and skin range from crimson, dark purple, maroon, and orange-red.

entries.name: Cruel Sycophants
entries: A piscoloth is a brutal and despicable bully who serves as the captain or sergeant of the yugoloth armies. Sadistic and slavering, it torments those underneath its station and fawns over its masters. A piscoloth is also opportunistic and ambitious, quick to betray its rivals or sacrifice its underlings if it would further its position.

entries.name: Vision of Madness
entries: A piscoloth avoids melee combat whenever it can, preferring to let its minions engage while it attacks from a safe distance using its Vision of Madness, a psychic attack that renders a target bewildered. If a mark has been suitably weakened or recognizes a victim as not a threat, it closes in on it and tries to snare it with its pincers. Once the piscoloth has a creature trapped, it attacks the victim's head with its venomous tentacles.

monsterFluff.name: Pulverizer
entries: 像{@creature hammerer|mme2-v2|hammerers}一样，粉碎机是为建筑、采矿和隧道工作而创造的。当用于战争时，粉碎机充当军事攻城工程师。它们从类似大炮的头部发出强烈的尖锐声音，可以击穿坚硬的石头和岩石。不幸被声音投射击中的生物会晕头转向，失去知觉。

items.name: Quicklick Captain
entries: 一群{@creature quickling|MPMM|quicklings}出来捣乱的人通常由一名队长带领。这个恶毒的{@creature quickling|MPMM}很狡猾和残忍，利用协调的打击确保其目标——制造麻烦和痛苦——得以实现。

monsterFluff.name: Quickling Warlock of the Gloaming Court

items.name: Quicklick Warlock of the Gloaming Court
entries: 这位快步精灵术士侍奉着空与黑暗女王(Queen of Air and Darkness)，那位黑暗魔法与谋杀的精灵神。这位恶毒的{@creature quickling|MPMM}运用幻术和魔法来播下纷争和混乱，然后陶醉于随之而来的混乱和悲剧。

monsterFluff.name: Radiant Soul
entries: 光辉之魂是一名类似有翅膀的天使的巫师。它从与天体源的神圣联系中汲取其奥术力量。

monsterFluff.name: Rage Drake
entries: 暴怒龙类似于{@creature adult red dragon||red dragons}，拥有大型猫一样的身体。它们极具攻击性、强壮和凶猛，通常会通过猛扑猎物来展开攻击。那些不幸幸存于初始攻击的人会被暴怒龙强大的下颚残忍地撕裂，就像玩偶一样。
尽管因其脾气难以驾驭，它们有时会被{@deity Tiamat|Dawn War|DMG}的冠军捕获并驯服作为坐骑。

items: A ranaeloth is the least powerful of its kind. It resembles a spindly, 7-foot tall upright frog with warty greenish-brown leathery hide, horns on its head, fanged maw, and clawed limbs.

In combat, a ranaeloth attacks with bites and sharp claws and can also use its prehensile tongue to grab and reel foes in. In addition, they have a poisonous breath weapon which it uses against large groups of foes.

items.name: Redcap Bloodlock
entries: 一位红帽血锁((redcap bloodlock))是一位危险的术士，被邪恶的守护者赋予了利用血液魔法的能力，使其能够暂时控制和吸取其他生物的血液。

items.name: Redcap Gang Boss
entries: 红帽帮派头目通常是{@creature redcap|MPMM}帮派中最老、最强壮的。它欺凌所有比它弱小的成员，并通过恐惧获得他们的尊重，确保他们在战斗中服从其命令。

items: Redspawn firebelchers bear the resemblance of a {@creature adult red dragon||red dragon} with the body of a massive bull, their bulky bodies averaging at least 12 feet long. They are vicious, stupid brutes that will attack anything that isn't aligned with {@deity Tiamat|dawn war|DMG}.

entries.name: Lava Lurkers
entries: Redspawn firebelchers prefer to live in extremely hot areas such as active volcanoes, living solitary lives until mating season. They tend to laze around in rivers of lava until they get hungry, in which case they leave and hunt for food in the nearby lands. If they sense prey nearby, the redspawn belchers hide just below the surface of the lava and slowly make their approach until their target is within striking distance or within range of their firebelch, which is a glob of fiery lava that the firebelcher spits out.
Cultists of {@deity Tiamat|Dawn War|DMG} and {@creature adult red dragon||red dragons} often use firebelchers as guards and place them in lava pools, just like how crocodiles are used for moats.

items: The remmanon appears as a naked androgynous humanoid creature that is constantly hovering a few feet above the ground. Barbed chains and hooks adorn its hairless skin, and long ram-like horns curl backwards on each side of its head.

entries.name: Devils of Discord
entries: Remmanons are greater devils of discord, greed, jealousy, and lust. They hate and destroy the concepts of camaraderie, kinship, teamwork, trust, and harmony by sowing dissonance among mortals, breaking their ranks from within. Most remmanons can be found in Phlegethos, and serve the archdevil Fierna, while a few work under {@creature Dispater|mme2-v2} and Mammon.

entries.name: Insidious Manipulators
entries: In combat, remmanons prefer to stay behind the front lines and will very rarely engage in melee. They would rather manipulate and influence without been seen, using spells and their Insidious Aura to do most of the damage. If hard-pressed, they summon bearded devils to protect them and if they must, use their accursed hellfire touch that can send souls to hell.

items.name: Sea Spawn Pincer
entries: 海生物钳状物看起来像是半螃蟹，半人形生物。钳状物的身体被坚硬的外骨骼覆盖，肩膀和四肢上长有尖锐的刺。巨大的钳状爪子既是手也是武器。钳状物比同类更强壮，甚至会攻击比自己更大的生物，用它那凶猛的爪子咬向对手。

items.name: Sea Spawn Shocker
entries: 海生电击者(shocker)是一种可怕的类似鳗鱼或章鱼的人形生物，有着厚实的蹼状手。它的皮肤是深灰色的，除了胸部通常是暗黄色或橙色的，上面布满着绿色斑点。它利用电击来震晕并使猎物无法动弹，从而更容易将其拖入水中致死。

items.name: Sea Spawn Stinger
entries: 刺尾鱼是一种具有魔鬼鱼特征和特性的海洋生物。它的身体光滑且漆黑，尾巴修长，末端带有一根凶猛的刺。
在战斗中，螫刺者在水下滑行，直到它可以直接刺中目标。猎物被螫刺者的{@condition paralyzed}和{@condition poisoned}所击中，使得{@creature sea spawn|MPMM}可以将其拖入水底坟墓。

items.name: Sea Spawn Tidesinger
entries: 这种奇怪的海洋产物潮歌者有着人形的上半身和章鱼的下半身。它避免进行肉搏战，更喜欢保持远离近战范围并使用它的吟游诗人魔法。然而，如果有任何敌人靠得太近，它将毫不犹豫地使用它那双像虎钳一样的触手来抓住并压缩对方。

entries.items: Dawnkillers are assassins of the shadar-kai that use the cover of darkness to move in stealth as they hunt their prey. These sinister killers are armed with a kukri infused with necrotic energy, which becomes deadlier when they strike their targets while within in the shadows.

Kithguards are warrior illusionists that serve directly under {@creature shadar-kai kithlord|mme2-v2|kithlords} as personal bodyguards. They are extremely loyal fanatics who will gladly sacrifice their lives if needed. Kithguards are armed with phantasmal daggers that, upon striking a creature, rot its flesh and weaken its will.

Kithlords are master illusionists and shadow weavers, and also the undisputed leaders and generals of the shadar-kai army. They can deflect attacks and spells and use the darkness to teleport closer to its enemies. They are armed with a potent phantasmal daggers that debilitate a creature's mind and cause the flesh to decay with every hit.

The painbearer is a graceful warrior known for the spiked chains that it uses in battle and the tattoos, body piercings, and symbols that adorn its skin. The symbols increase in number throughout the painbearer's life, as it tries to block out the curse of gloom with excruciating pain. Painbearers trap enemies in pitch-black shadow cages where the darkness slowly latches on to their bodies and starts to leech away their lives.

items: Sometimes a remarkable {@creature shadow mastiff alpha|MPMM} survives long enough and grows into an unusually large size. It becomes a pack lord, a fearsome specimen that all {@creature shadow mastiff|MPMM|shadow mastiffs} will submit to.
Pack lords can lead multiple packs, each led by an {@creature shadow mastiff alpha|MPMM|alpha}.

monsterFluff.name: Sharpshooter
entries: 神射手是高技能的弓箭手，几乎不会失手，能够进行令人难以置信的射击。他们的箭矢命中精准，甚至能击中那些被掩护的目标。

items: Strongest and largest of its kind, the shoosuva pack lord leads other {@creature shoosuva|MPMM} in service of {@creature Yeenoghu|MPMM}. Very rarely, the shooshuva pack lord, along with a pack of {@creature shoosuva|MPMM}, will appear before a mighty {@creature gnoll champion of yeenoghu|mme2-v2|gnoll champion}, {@creature gnoll matriarch|MonsterManualExpanded|matriarch}, or queen who has proven its worth to {@creature Yeenoghu|MPMM}.

entries.name: Yeenoghu's Laugh
entries: No creature can stand the unnerving cackle that is emitted by a shoosuva pack lord. This potent 'laugh,' said to be a perfect mimic of {@creature yeenoghu|MPMM|Yeenoghu's} laugh himself, can drain the will and courage of any creature that hears it and at the same bolster the shoosuva pack lord's allies.

monsterFluff.name: Stone Drake
entries: 石龙在山丘和山脉上用岩石突出部标记它们的领地，完美地融入周围环境中。这些龙是狡猾的伏击者，可以迅速从一个裂缝移动到另一个而不被注意到。当面对压倒性的对手时，它们会使用强大的吐息武器——一种酸性吐息，极其强大，可以融化受害者的盔甲。
强大的领主和能够说话的法师们捕捉年幼的石龙，并训练它们来守卫他们的城堡墙壁和地牢，以防止入侵者。

entries.items: Stone giant skirmishers serve behind the front lines of a stone giant war party. Incredibly agile and nimble, skirmishers use a combination of stealth and speed to close the distance between its opponents or retreat behind cover. These stone giants are master {@item spear|phb} and rock throwers, hitting vital points with cruel accuracy.

The stone giant thane is the traditional ruler of all {@creature stone giant} kind. It lives deep in its underground stone fortress and is always surrounded by its fiercest {@creature stone giant warden|mme2-v2|stone giant wardens} and {@creature stone giant earth shaman|MonsterManualExpanded|shamans}. It doesn't need their protection, however. The stone giant thane, a fearsome warrior that can draw arcane power from the earth, is powerful enough to defend himself even against the mightiest foes.

As its title suggests, the normally solitary stone giant warden is a fierce guardian that serves to defend its territory. In the event of intruders, a warden can summon earthen pseudopods from the ground to hold and entangle its targets.

Perhaps tempted by an archdevil or consumed by his thirst for vengeance or power, the once noble storm giant is now a blackguard, a malevolent tyrant seeking to subjugate everything—even other giants.

Misguided worshippers of a {@creature kraken} are sometimes gifted with power. The most devout of them become priests that slowly undergo horrific physical mutations, turning their appearances into the likeness of their very deity. Yet almost all of these priests end up becoming pawns and fodder for the {@creature kraken||kraken's} schemes. In very rare instances, however, a {@creature kraken} will answer the call of a fallen mighty creature, such as a {@creature storm giant} who was either left for dead at the bottom of the ocean or simply seeking a patron to help it achieve its goals. Recognizing the benefits of having a powerful creature as its champion, the {@creature kraken} grants it its wishes, bestowing some of its divine power, and making it its exarch.

entries.name: The Aspects
entries: 神祇和邪魔有时会将他们的一部分力量发送到原质平面，以帮助他们的信徒。这些精神能量的碎片会显现为"化身"，这种存在在形态上类似于他们的发起者，但并非直接受其控制。相反，它们是完全独立的实体，尽管与其原型分享相同的议程。
方面永远不能被召唤，但备受青睐的祭司或法师可以请求他们的神灵赐予他们一个(Aspect)。

entries.name: Born of Power
entries: 尽管只是祖先力量的一小部分，(Aspects)将以几乎与他们的祖先相同的物理和生物形态出现，并具有几乎相匹配的属性和特征，但力量会被缩减。除非另有规定，(fiendish Aspects)在消散之前会持续666天，或者在被他们的祖先召回之前。

entries.name: There can be only One
entries: 每次始源者创造一个（Aspect）时，只能存在一个，无论创造多少次。此外，始源者不能存在于与其（Aspect）相同的位面。当始源者创造一个（Aspect）时，它会将自身的一部分本质发送到目的位面。只有当它到达那个位面时，（Aspect）才会具象。一旦（Aspect）被创造，始源者必须召回它或等待其消散，才能创造新的（Aspect）。

entries.name: Independent Extension
entries: （方面）并非由其（创造者）直接控制，也无法通过（方面）的眼睛看到任何事物或获知（方面）发现的任何知识。它们在显现后是独立的存在，会根据其（创造者）的取向和总体目标行事。它们知道自己并非"真实"存在，但明白自己是一种延伸，并且安慰于一旦消散，它们将回归到自己的真实形态。

items: The embodiment of hopelessness and despair, the grim is among the mightiest of the sorrowsworn that can be found in the Shadowfell. It resembles an 8-foot tall, slender humanoid creature with pale emaciated skin, thin horns protruding from its head, bulging red eyes, large leathery wings on its back, and hands with long clawed fingers clutching a scythe made out of bones and dark steel.

entries.name: Lord of Despair
entries: The grim radiates an aura of bleakness, forcing creatures nearby to be overwhelmed with feelings of despair. In addition, the grim can whisper and hiss constantly. Creatures unfortunate enough to be within range will hear it, even in their minds. The grim can then choose to fill their thoughts either of extreme sorrow, deep emptiness, or memories of past losses and regret.

entries.name: Reaping Scythe
entries: Those that do survive the harrowing abilities of the grim will still have to contend with its deadly scythe that it attacks with thrice each turn, and with each hit can inflict grievous wounds that can't be healed normally.

items.name: Tlincalli Chieftain
entries: 游牧部落{@creature tlincalli|MPMM|tlincallis}总是由一个酋长领导。这位强大的生物是一位出色的猎人和战士。这位酋长几乎被他的部民奉若神明，而看到它在战斗中表现出色会激起{@creature tlincalli|MPMM|tlincallis}的斗志。

items.name: Tlincalli Shaman
entries: 特林卡利（Tlincalli）萨满是德鲁伊法术施法者，他们在部落从一个地方到另一个地方旅行时提供支持。 萨满可以创造食物和水，还可以施放法术来保护他们的部落免受自然和非自然元素的伤害。

entries.name: Elementalists
entries: 在战斗中，特林卡利萨满通常会首先施放尖刺生长来减缓和削弱他们的敌人，然后施放{@spell wall of fire}来分割和孤立他们。最后使用{@spell erupting earth|XGE}、西罗科和近战攻击来结束敌人。

items.name: Tlincalli Witch
entries: 这位狡诈的{@creature tlincalli|MPMM}女巫是一名与大恶魔或恶魔王子达成契约的术士。作为交换，这位特林卡利女巫可以给予饥荒、瘟疫和贪婪的害虫，比如跳蚤、蝗虫和老鼠，来侵袭她的敌人。更糟糕的是，这位特林卡利女巫可以将卵植入敌人的身体中。这些卵孵化出微小的寄生虫，会吃掉它们的宿主。

entries.items: Most tortles are warriors and druids. But a few manage to become monks, scouts, and witch doctors.

items.name: Monstrous and Young Trapper
entries: 《怪兽图鉴》中提供的{@creature trapper|VGM}是成年怪兽的信息。本节介绍的是幼年和怪诞版本。
这些年轻的陷阱者有10英尺长的翼展。巨大的陷阱者可以达到40英尺的翼展。

items.name: Troll Berserker
entries: 比典型{@creature troll}更强大更庞大，可怕的狂战士们毫不顾忌地冲向猎物，用它们的爪子疯狂地挥舞和撕裂，用锯齿状的牙齿撕裂肉体。

items.name: Troll Monarch
entries: 巨魔君主是一个庞大而可怕的形象。在战斗中，它用它的{@item greataxe|phb}攻击，轻松地劈开敌人，然后用可怕的咬击结束那些在第一击后幸存下来的敌人。
仅仅看到巨魔君主就能激励其他{@creature troll||trolls}，让他们变成狂热的战士。

items.name: Troll Shaman
entries: 萨满是支持同伴的{@creature troll}德鲁伊，通过法术控制战场并倾斜冲突的力量。这些{@creature troll||trolls}也可以暂时赋予其盟友瓦普拉克的愤怒和体质，使他们能以非自然的凶猛战斗并恢复生命值。

items.name: Troll Whelp
entries: 巨魔幼崽，虽然常见，但很少被看到，因为它们在巢穴遭到攻击时经常躲藏或逃跑。尽管只有几岁，它们就已经和人类一样高，已经能够用它们的獠牙、牙齿和爪子进行防御和战斗。

items.name: Troll Witch Doctor
entries: 巨魔巫医是{@creature troll}部落的治疗师、神谕者，以及{@creature troll}神明瓦普拉克的先知。在战斗中，它使用那些对敌人阵线造成严重破坏的法术，比如{@spell bestow curse}和{@spell erupting earth|XGE}。
当被迫进入近战时，巨魔巫医仍然是一个危险的敌人，因为它的爪子和牙齿仍然可以撕裂一个人成碎片。

items.name: Two-Headed Troll
entries: 两头巨魔的起源并不确定。有人说这是由于与{@creature ettin}杂交导致的。还有人说是因为{@creature troll}吃掉了另一个{@creature troll}，而被吃掉的{@creature troll}的头长出来并融入了吃掉者的身体。这也不太可能，因为这样的{@creature troll}据说是{@creature dire troll|MPMM}，是一个完全不同的物种，不具备相同的特征。无论如何，这样的{@creature troll}似乎被其同类视为瓦普拉克的恩赐。

items.name: Ulitharid Mastermind
entries: 一个乌利萨里德(Ulitharid)主谋是一个极其聪明的战术家、策划者和操纵者。它在幕后进行工作，秘密指示手下和部下去执行肮脏的、实际的任务，同时也影响其他强大的存在，比如其他{@creature ulitharid|MPMM}和{@creature mind flayer||illithids}，让它们有意识或无意识地为其目标努力。

entries.name: Paranoid Schemer
entries: 由于其天性，一个乌利萨里德（Ulitharid）策划者在行动中非常谨慎，因为害怕{@creature elder brain|MPMM}会认为它是威胁，并提前结束它的生命。因此，它非常偏执，倾向于清除任何潜在威胁，消耗他们的大脑，以消除{@creature elder brain|MPMM}可能发现的任何证据。

items.name: Ulitharid Supreme
entries: 被赋予最高权力的{@creature ulitharid|MPMM}被称为至尊，充当{@creature mind flayer||illithid}殖民地{@creature elder brain|MPMM}的右臂。它很少离开殖民地的安全范围，更喜欢在行政职能上充当乌利萨里德的领袖。
如果它必须离开，它总是有几个较小的{@creature ulitharid|MPMM|ulitharids}和超过十几个{@creature mind flayer||illithid}保镖陪同。然而，这更多是为了炫耀而非必要，因为乌利萨里德至高者本身非常有能力保护自己，即使是面对强大的敌人，比如高级冒险者或吉思。

entries.name: Constant Threat
entries: 尽管对{@creature elder brain|MPMM}忠诚无比，乌利萨里德至高者知道自己的力量已经增长得太多，将被{@creature elder brain|MPMM}及其手下认定为威胁。因此，它将准备应对，要么逃离并脱离殖民地，要么摧毁并取代{@creature elder brain|MPMM}成为殖民地的新领袖。

items: Ursaloths are the most powerful of guardian yugoloths. These vicious yugoloths look like 12-foot-tall bipedal demonic bears with bat-like wings sprouting from their backs and terrible eagle-like talons for hands.

In combat, they prefer to tear their opponents to shreds with their bites and talons. If facing challenging opponents, they can use their devastating fire breath. In addition to these abilities, they can employ spells that can snuff light, confuse opponents, and dispel enemy magic. This kind of versatility and power makes the ursaloths highly sought after, and are very expensive guardians to acquire.

items.name: Vegepygmy Shaman
entries: 蔬菜矮人萨满通常是{@creature vegepygmy|MPMM}社区中唯一的法师类型。他们担任部落的医治者、先知和首席顾问。

items.name: Vegepygmy Warrior
entries: 蔬菜矮人战士是部落的守卫、猎人和战争时期的主要士兵。

monsterFluff.name: Verbeeg
entries: Verbeeg（巨人）是9到10英尺高的令人不快的巨人，他们与通常肌肉发达和粗暴的巨人形态相比，更具有人类般的特征和比例。

entries.name: Barbaric Mercenaries
entries: 大多数巨魔人天性邪恶，过着野蛮的生活——抢劫附近的定居点，掳走人质作为奴隶或勒索金。还有一些愿意当无耻的雇佣兵，为出价最高的雇主工作。

entries.name: Cunning Bullies
entries: Verbeeg（维比格）很聪明，很少单独出现。他们经常欺凌和控制像{@creature ogre||ogres}、{@creature hill giant||hill giants}和{@creature troll||trolls}这样智力较低的巨人族群，强迫和操纵他们做繁重的工作，比如战斗，而自己则留在相对安全的地方。
瓦比格(verbeeg)经常在地下洞穴、地牢和废弃的城堡中建立巢穴。他们通常崇拜邪恶的巨人神，比如{@deity Grolantor|nonhuman}和瓦普拉克(Vaprak)。然而，大多数瓦比格信仰卡隆托(Karontor)，这是巨人之神，代表仇恨和毁容。由于卡隆托也是{@creature fomorian||fomorians}的主保神，发现瓦比格与畸形巨人合作并不罕见。

monsterFluff.name: War Caster
entries: 战争施法者是同时接受法师和战士训练的人。他们已经适应在近战战斗中使用魔法，能够更好地保持专注力，并在施放咒语后进行武器攻击。

monsterFluff.name: War Chanter
entries: 战歌吟唱者是专注于激励他人在战斗中取得成功或使敌人士气低落的吟游诗人。他们是有能力的战士，但更受重视的是他们激励盟友和施展吟游诗人魔法的能力。

monsterFluff.name: Wendigo
entries: 一个温迪戈是一种可怕的精灵精神，它出没在寒冷的温带森林和荒凉的冻原。由于它的外表和对人类肉体的贪婪渴望，它经常被误认为是不死生物或狼人。

entries.name: Bestial Horror
entries: 温迪戈出现为一个消瘦可怕的9英尺高的人形生物，头部是瘦弱的麋鹿头带着鹿角。它邪恶的身体覆盖着深色打结的带血污的毛发。它非自然地长长的手臂末端是凶猛的爪子，嘴巴里布满了锋利的牙齿。

entries.name: Ravenous Spirit
entries: 曾经，(`the wendigo`)是一个邪恶的类人生物，它猎杀并捕食自己的同类，在荒野中独自生存，作为食人族生活了大部分时间。这样的生物会引起(`the Queen of Air and Darkness`)或{@deity Malar|Faerûnian|SCAG}(`the Beastlord`)的注意。在这个生物死亡之前，赐予它恩惠的神明会赋予它一份礼物，或者说是一种诅咒，将这个生物转变为贪婪的(`wendigo`)。这使得这个生物可以永远继续它在前世所做的事情。

items.name: Werebat Alpha
entries: 虽然大多数{@creature werebat|WDMM|werebats}是{@creature goblin}血统，一些地底人类族群({@creature drow}，{@creature grimlock||grimlocks}，{@creature duergar}等)甚至{@creature orc||orcs}也会受到影响。这些人往往比普通{@creature werebat|WDMM}更有经验和智慧，并发现自己领导着殖民地。

entries.items: {@creature wererat||Wererats} who show an aptitude for becoming inconspicuous and have mastered the craft of making quick and silent kills become assassins. They normally join thieves' and assassins' guilds but seldom do they reveal their true nature.

items: {@deity Malar|Faerûnian|SCAG} the Beastlord, the god of bestial bloodlust, savagery, and evil lycanthropes, will sometimes choose amongst its worshippers champions to lead its flock. These champions must have proven itself in savage combat, displaying both unparalleled brutality and cunning. The Beastlord bestows upon them enhanced strength, ferocity, and extraordinary abilities.

There are only a handful of such champions, known as Favored by Malar, and only one exists for each type of evil lycanthrope. The overall leader of the People of the Black Blood, a loosely organized tribe of evil lycanthropes that worship {@deity Malar|Faerûnian|SCAG}, is almost always a Favored by Malar.

Whitespawn iceskidders resemble 11-foot-long dragon-headed white lizards that have adapted to gliding over icy surfaces. Their forelimb wings aren't used for flight but instead for adjusting their air resistance while they skim over the ice.

Iceskidders are at home anywhere there is frozen water. They roam the vicinity singly or in pairs looking for prey to hunt, often initiating attacks using their freezing breath to hold victims in place before closing in to finish them off with a killing bite or slashing wing.
Followers of {@deity Tiamat|Dawn War|DMG} often use iceskidders as mounts or to pull sleds across frozen surfaces.

items.name: Wood Woad Grove Keeper
entries: 当一个德鲁伊自愿参加仪式，牺牲自己成为{@creature wood woad|MPMM}时，结果是成为一名林园守护者。这种生物类似于普通的{@creature wood woad|MPMM}，但它还具有施放德鲁伊法术的能力。木卫林园守护者保护着森林和生活在其中的生物。

items.name: Wood Woad Grove Warden
entries: 一个树林守卫者是由一个宣誓过{@class paladin|PHB|Oath of the Ancients|Ancients}的精灵圣武士所作的牺牲而创造的。这个生物保留了它以前生命中的圣武士能力，现在利用这些能力来帮助保护它的森林领土。

items.name: Wood Woad Sentinel
entries: 木制狼人哨兵是从一位前骑士的心脏诞生的，导致它成为一个擅长保护和捍卫它的{@creature wood woad|MPMM}的生物。

items: The xerfilstyx is a greater devil that has the upper form of a huge winged devil, while its lower half is that of the body of a giant slug. It lives within the depths of the River Styx, sampling the memory fragments of souls that flow through it. Having lived in the waters of Styx, the xerfilstyx devil has been driven insane from the constant bombardment of memories. Like the sweetest of poisons, a xerfilstyx takes pleasure in the memories it absorbs while it dissolves its own mind. It is this insanity that drives xerfilstyx to attack other creatures, eager to drive them into the waters of Styx and taste memories within it. It is also because of this that other devils avoid them.

entries.name: Opportune Fighters
entries: Xerfilstyx fight from the safety of the River Styx, unleashing a barrage of offensive ice-based spells to stun its enemies until it can charge in for a grapple. Once an enemy is {@condition grappled}, the xerfilstyx's small lamprey-like tentacle suckers will drain it of its blood. When faced with overwhelming numbers, the xerfilstyx will use its dreaded blood breath, exhaling its own blood which is so caustic it can melt flesh like butter.

entries.items: Cutthroats are vicious, opportunistic thugs that serve the will of Raxivort. These xvarts use stealth and strength in numbers to overwhelm their targets.

The shaman of Raxivort is a devout worshiper of the Lord of Xvartkind. The shaman is granted druidic spells and abilities by the {@creature xvart|MPMM} god, making it a natural leader of small {@creature xvart|MPMM} tribes. In larger tribes, the xvart shaman serves as an adviser to the tribe {@creature xvart speaker|mme2-v2|speaker}.

items: The cunning xvart speaker serves as the tribe's chieftain. It spends most of its time scheming, conniving, and obsessing with hoarding valuable treasure. It trusts no one, not even its advisers, and for good reason. {@creature xvart|MPMM|Xvarts} by nature are so greedy they can't stop themselves from scheming and finding opportunities to usurp their leader and steal.

In combat, the speaker is normally the most formidable warrior of its kind, wields a {@item scimitar|phb} laced with poison, and uses every advantage it can find, to the point of overpreparing, to maximize success.

entries.items: While {@creature rat||rats} and {@creature bat||bats} are naturally attracted to {@creature xvart|MPMM|xvarts}, they become fanatical followers to an xvart verminlord. This {@creature xvart|MPMM} has a supernatural affinity with the vermin, and can summon and command them to do its bidding, even if it would mean risking their lives. The verminlord normally rides a {@creature giant rat} or {@creature giant bat||bat} as a mount.

items.name: Yeth Hound Alpha
entries: 魔犬头领在狩猎和追踪猎物时领导它们的猎群。它们采用袭击和撤退的战术对付更大更强的目标。它们会首先扑向猎物，将其击倒，让盟友们能够迅速轻松地攻击，然后退回黑暗中，等待猎物流血和虚弱。当它们感觉猎物的意志几乎被打破时，它们会发出凶恶的嗥叫，然后发动致命一击。

monsterFluff.name: Young Beholder
entries: 年轻眼魔一诞生便迎来了第一个挑战。作为{@creature beholder||beholder's}梦境或噩梦的产物，年轻眼魔不仅被视为其创造者的翻版，还被视为一种威胁。十有八九，年轻眼魔会立刻被其创造者杀死。{@creature beholder||Beholders}那些设法逃脱的（(Underdark)）,这些是例外，最终在地下世界漫游，寻找自己的领地，展现自己的价值，并成长为成年眼魔。

items.name: Young Froghemoth
entries: 在{@creature bullywug||bullywugs}中，发现年轻的蛙妖兽被当作神明对待并认为是Ramenos的化身并不罕见。年轻的蛙妖兽看起来像更成熟的同类，但体积明显较小，使得{@creature bullywug||bullywugs}可以通过喂食它们捕获的动物和人类来"驯服"它们。然而这些年轻的蛙妖兽仍然非常危险，偶尔会吞下{@creature bullywug}，或者几乎任何靠近它们嘴巴的东西。

items.name: Young Gray Render
items.entries: Young gray renders are created from nodules that burst from the bodies of adult {@creature gray render|MPMM|gray renders}. They will be abandoned by their parents to fend for themselves, and some may form packs for the first few weeks in order to survive. Eventually, they will live solitary lives, consuming anything edible they come across, until they are mature enough to bond with an intelligent being.

items.name: Young Leviathan
entries: Young leviathans retain the same shape as their elder counterparts, albeit a tad smaller and less powerful. These massive serpent-like creatures roam the deepest seas, protecting its subjects. In their true forms, young leviathans can crush coastal fortresses with their blows and sink battleships with massive tidal waves. Fortunately, young leviathans are rarely encountered, and only the fool-hardy would dare provoke them.

items.name: Elder Elementals
entries: When pure elemental energies converge, a new elemental is created. This occasion, however, is extremely rare and only happen during catastrophic events that involve the elements. There are some situations, like that of the {@creature phoenix|MPMM}, where an elemental is reborn into a new body when its current one is weakened. Many theories other than the ones above persists, yet we will never know how these mysterious and powerful elementals came to be. One thing is for sure, young versions of elder elementals are more likelier to be encountered in their home planes.

items.name: Young Phoenix
entries: When a {@creature phoenix|MPMM} dies, or when it sees its powers dim, it can choose to die and be reborn anew. The young phoenix partially retains the wisdom of its former self, and gains a hot-headed temperament, eager to try its new-born powers in the world.

items.name: Elder Elementals
entries: When pure elemental energies converge, a new elemental is created. This occasion, however, is extremely rare and only happen during catastrophic events that involve the elements. There are some situations, like that of the {@creature phoenix|MPMM}, where an elemental is reborn into a new body when its current one is weakened. Many theories other than the ones above persists, yet we will never know how these mysterious and powerful elementals came to be. One thing is for sure, young versions of elder elementals are more likelier to be encountered in their home planes.

items.name: Young Leviathan
entries: Young tempests are born from the most powerful lightning storms, forming their serpent-like body alongside their "parent" until they are whole. Like their adult brethren, young tempests are temperamental, and are prone to unleashing torrential rains and punishing winds across all land they pass through.

items.name: Elder Elementals
entries: When pure elemental energies converge, a new elemental is created. This occasion, however, is extremely rare and only happen during catastrophic events that involve the elements. There are some situations, like that of the {@creature phoenix|MPMM}, where an elemental is reborn into a new body when its current one is weakened. Many theories other than the ones above persists, yet we will never know how these mysterious and powerful elementals came to be. One thing is for sure, young versions of elder elementals are more likelier to be encountered in their home planes.

items.name: Young Leviathan
entries: {@creature zaratan|MPMM|Zaratans} are born from earthquakes and are about the size of a small hill when young. These dim-witted elementals only concern themselves with food, moving slowly across the terrain in search of the best territory. They are, however, very territorial and when provoked, can create small earthquakes and spew various debris from their maws.

items.name: Elder Elementals
entries: When pure elemental energies converge, a new elemental is created. This occasion, however, is extremely rare and only happen during catastrophic events that involve the elements. There are some situations, like that of the {@creature phoenix|MPMM}, where an elemental is reborn into a new body when its current one is weakened. Many theories other than the ones above persists, yet we will never know how these mysterious and powerful elementals came to be. One thing is for sure, young versions of elder elementals are more likelier to be encountered in their home planes.

items.name: Yuan-ti Anathema Ascendant
entries: 在其扭曲种族中最强大的，升华者是一种罕见的{@creature yuan-ti anathema|MPMM|anathema}，通过牺牲、仪式和战斗获得了巨大的力量——它相信这种力量足以让它成为一个半神。
尽管大多数{@creature yuan-ti anathema|MPMM|anathema}生活在蛇人殖民地之外，只有被狂热崇拜者寻找，但升华者却受到恐惧和崇敬地欢迎，作为领袖和神灵。这些狡诈的存在仍在通往神格之路上，会毫不犹豫地将其崇拜者用作战斗中的炮灰或祭品。

entries.items: Arcane archers are yuan-ti that have learned to imbue their ranged weapons with magic, after extracting the knowledge from elven prisoners. They enhance their arrows with arcane force and shadow powers to pummel and blind enemies in battle.

items: An ignan is a rare fire-based subtype of yuan-ti that live in extremely hot places, such as volcanoes and lava beds.

In combat, the brutish ignan prefers to use its melee attacks, gleefully crushing enemies with its {@item mace|phb}, horns, and powerful tail. If outnumbered, an ignan will not hesitate to use its {@spell fireball} spell.
The yuan-ti often use ignan as guardians in temples and treasure vaults.
Yuan-ti mageslayers are trained to fight and counter enemy spellcasters. They can anticipate and read spellcaster actions, such as somatic movement, and can strike them to break their concentration.
A yuan-ti war party or set of guards will always have at least one mageslayer with them.

Yuan-ti spies take the form of their enemies and entrench themselves within enemy territory. Aside from gathering intel, they are sometimes employed to assassinate key targets. In such missions, they always employ poison, sneaking it in the food and drink that the target will ingest.
They always avoid combat, and will only fight if escape is not an option.

entries.items: Templars are the unholy warrior priests of {@deity Sseth|yuan-ti|VGM}. These armored yuan-ti carry a {@item morningstar|phb} and a {@item longbow|phb} into battle, while wielding divine spells to tip the battle in their favor. Able melee combatants, templars can rush in to battle with an incredibly accurate guided strike—which it often uses against heavily armored or very agile opponents.

items: Zovvuts are the bastard spawns of angels that were assaulted by greater demons and demon princes. They resemble large, muscular hairless {@creature ogre||ogres} with fanged and tusked maws and arms that end in scimitar-like finger claws. Wretched feather wings stretch from their humped backs, the only vestige left of their angelic heritage. Make no mistake, zovvuts may be half an angel, but their hearts are full of hate and anger as their demonic parent's which is probably why they resent being commanded or spoken down to by their more powerful ilk.

entries.name: Reckless Brutes
entries: Foul tempered and hard to control, their masters often just set them loose against foes and left on their own, which is probably wise. Zovvuts rely mostly on their brute strength, wading recklessly into melee and shredding their victims with their fearsome claws.

legendaryGroup.name: Asmodeus
lairActions: 在20号先攻（失去先攻时平局）时，阿斯莫德斯可以执行以下其中一项巢穴行动；他不能连续两轮执行相同的巢穴行动：

items: 阿斯莫德斯施放任何 {@filter spell of 7th level or below that has a casting time of one action|spells|level=0;1;2;3;4;5;6;7|cast time=action}，只需口头组件，并使用智慧作为施法能力（法术豁免 {@dc 27}，用法术攻击命中 {@hit +19}）。阿斯莫德斯在进行长休息之前不能再次施放相同的法术。
阿斯莫德斯（Asmodeus）瞄准他巢穴内选择的每个生物。每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 27}感知豁免投。未通过豁免的生物不能以攻击或有害法术瞄准阿斯莫德斯。该效果持续到下一回合的20号先攻。
阿斯莫德斯魔法召唤他的分身，一个{@creature aspect of Asmodeus|mme2-v2}。它出现在距离阿斯莫德斯120英尺内的未被占据的空间，并绝对服从阿斯莫德斯的命令。它会持续一个小时，直到它或阿斯莫德斯死亡，直到阿斯莫德斯将其解散为一个动作，或者直到阿斯莫德斯再次使用这个巢穴动作。

regionalEffects: 阿斯莫德斯（Asmodeus）巢穴所在地区被其魔法扭曲，产生以下一种或多种效果：

items: 魔鬼在巢穴周围6英里范围内充当阿斯莫德斯的眼睛和耳朵。
在距离巢穴6英里范围内且未与阿斯莫德斯结盟的生物必须在每个小时结束时进行一次{@dc 20}智力豁免检定，否则会在接下来的一个小时内变成{@condition frightened}。在{@condition frightened}时，生物不会自愿靠近巢穴。成功通过豁免检定的生物在接下来的24小时内免疫此效应。
在距离巢穴1英里范围内的每60英尺处，地面上会喷发直径10英尺、高20英尺的火焰和熔岩坑。任何接触火焰的生物或物体会受到10点火焰伤害({@damage 3d6})，但每轮只能受到一次这种伤害。

regionalEffects: 如果阿斯莫德斯(Asmodeus)死亡，这些效果会在{@dice 1d10}天内逐渐消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Dispater
lairActions: 在20号先攻（在先攻相同时失去先攻）时，（Dispater）可以执行以下其中一项巢穴行动；不能连续两轮执行相同的巢穴行动：

items: 迪斯帕特(Dispater)施放{@spell wall of iron|mme2-v2}，只需要口头组件，并使用魅力作为施法能力（法术豁免{@dc 24}）。这堵墙持续1分钟，直到迪斯帕特再次使用这个巢穴动作，或者直到迪斯帕特死亡或被{@condition incapacitated}。
迪斯帕特让铁链从他能看到的地面、墙壁和天花板上升起，形成一个20英尺的正方形区域。它们会持续到下一个20号先攻。当铁链出现时，该区域内的每个生物必须成功进行一次{@dc 24}力量豁免检定，否则将被{@condition restrained}，直到铁链消失或迪斯帕特释放它们（无需动作）。
迪斯帕特尔(Dispater)使用魔法召唤{@dice 2d6}个{@creature merregon|MPMM|merregons}或1个{@creature erinyes}。它们出现在距离迪斯帕特尔120英尺内的未被占据的空间，并且绝对服从迪斯帕特尔的命令。它们会持续一个小时，直到它们或迪斯帕特尔死亡，直到迪斯帕特尔将其作为一个动作解散，或者直到迪斯帕特尔再次使用这个巢穴行动。

regionalEffects: 含有(Dispater)巢穴的区域被其魔法扭曲，会产生以下一种或多种效果：

items: 巢穴周围6英里范围内的空气散发着铁锈的气味。
在距离巢穴6英里范围内的生物，如果没有受到强烈、难以忍受的高温保护，必须在每小时结束时进行一次{@dc 20}体质豁免检定，否则将获得一级{@condition exhaustion}。
在距离巢穴1英里范围内的每60英尺处，地面上都覆盖着尖锐的铁钉和尖刺，形成半径20英尺的区域。这些区域是艰难地形。当生物进入或在该区域内移动时，每移动5英尺就会受到5({@damage 2d4})点穿刺伤害。生物必须进行一次{@dc 15}感知({@skill Perception})检定，以认识到这片地形是危险的，然后才能进入。

regionalEffects: 如果地狱公爵死亡，这些效果会在{@dice 1d10}天内逐渐消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Doomsphere
lairActions: 当在它的巢穴内战斗时，一只眼魔可以利用环境魔法来进行巢穴行动。在20（失去先攻的情况下）的先攻计数上，眼魔可以进行一次巢穴行动，产生以下效果之一：

items: 在距离末日球120英尺内的地面上，一个50英尺的正方形区域变得阴暗幽暗；直到下一轮的20号先攻之前，该区域都是艰难地形。每个在该区域开始其回合的生物必须成功通过一次{@dc 17}体质豁免才能免受7({@damage 2d6})点死灵伤害，并且在末日球的下一轮结束前无法恢复生命值。
在距离末日领域120英尺内的墙壁上，会长出触手，直到下下回合的20号倡议计数。末日领域选择的每个生物，在距离这样一堵墙15英尺内开始其回合时，必须成功进行一个{@dc 17} 敏捷豁免才能避免被{@condition grappled}。要逃脱，需要成功进行一个{@dc 17} 力量 ({@skill Athletics}) 或 敏捷 ({@skill Acrobatics}) 检定。
在距离末日球体不超过60英尺的固定表面上，一只腐烂的眼睛睁开。末日球体随机选择一个眼射线从那只眼睛射向它可以看到的目标。然后眼睛关闭并消失。

regionalEffects: 一个包含一只眼魔巢穴的地区被这只怪物的不自然存在所扭曲，会产生以下一种或多种效果：

items: 在邪眼兽巢穴范围内1英里的生物有时会感觉到被监视，即使实际上并没有。
当眼魔（Beholder）入睡时，其巢穴周围1英里范围内会发生微小的现实扭曲，然后在24小时后消失。洞穴墙壁上的痕迹可能会微妙地改变，一个怪异的小玩意可能会出现在之前不存在的地方，无害的黏液可能会覆盖雕像等等。这些效应仅适用于自然表面和不在任何人身上的非魔法物体。

regionalEffects: 如果触目兽死亡，这些效果会在{@dice 1d10}天内逐渐消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Lolth
lairActions: 在20号先攻（失败则先攻平局）时，洛思可以执行以下其中一项巢穴行动；她不能连续两轮执行相同的巢穴行动：

items: 蜘蛛女神在她的巢穴内的4个不同点位施放{@spell web}（法术豁免{@dc 25}，无需材料）. 蜘蛛女神无需看到这些点位，也无需维持对法术的集中。蜘蛛网持续1分钟，直到蜘蛛女神再次使用这个巢穴特殊动作，或者蜘蛛女神死亡或被{@condition incapacitated}。
洛思魔法召唤 {@dice 2d4} {@creature phase spider||phase spiders} 或 {@dice 1d3} {@creature drider||driders} 出现在她选择的巢穴内未被占据的空间。它们在1小时后消失。
洛思魔法召唤一个{@creature yochlol}。它出现在洛思附近60英尺内的一个空地上，并绝对服从洛思的命令。它会持续10分钟，直到它或洛思死亡，或者洛思以一个动作解散它。

regionalEffects: 包含洛思的巢穴的地区被其魔法扭曲，产生以下一个或多个效果：

items: {@creature giant spider||Giant spiders}和{@creature swarm of spiders||spider swarms}潜伏在巢穴周围6英里的地区。这些蜘蛛类生物很具攻击性，会立即袭击入侵者。
在巢穴周围6英里范围内的表面经常被蛛网覆盖。任何接触这些蛛网的生物都会被洛思的蛛网感知所察觉。
在巢穴周围6英里范围内出现的蜘蛛网会阻挡道路，或者消失并揭示新的道路，使得在该区域内导航变得极为困难。

regionalEffects: 如果洛思死亡，这些效果会在{@dice 1d10}天内逐渐消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Mephistopheles
lairActions: 在20号先攻（平局时先攻失败）时，梅菲斯托菲勒斯可以执行以下其中一项巢穴行动；他不能连续两轮执行相同的巢穴行动：

items: 魔菲斯托菲勒斯（Mephistopheles）瞄准他的巢穴内可见的一名生物。目标必须进行一次{@dc 23}敏捷豁免，未通过则受到14点（{@damage 4d6}）火焰伤害和14点（{@damage 4d6}）死灵伤害，通过则减半。如果目标死亡，其灵魂将被引导至冥河斯提克斯（River Styx），在那里它将立即转生为一名{@creature lemure}恶魔。该生物只能通过施放一次{@spell wish}咒语，然后再施放一次{@spell true resurrection}咒语才能复活。

梅菲斯托菲勒斯瞄准他能看到的一个点，距离他不超过120英尺。以该点为中心的30英尺半径范围内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 24}体质豁免才能。未通过豁免的生物会受到13点({@damage 3d8})冰冷伤害，并被冰冻1分钟。作为一次动作，被{@condition restrained}瞄准的目标可以进行一次{@dc 24}力量检定，若成功则打破冰冻。冰块也可以被攻击和摧毁（AC 13；hp 25；易受火焰伤害；免疫冷冻、毒素和精神伤害）。通过豁免的生物只会受到一半伤害，并且不会被冰冻。
梅菲斯托费勒魔法地召唤1 {@creature ice devil}。它出现在梅菲斯托费勒附近120英尺内的一个未被占据的空间，并绝对服从梅菲斯托费勒的命令。它会持续一个小时，直到它或梅菲斯托费勒死亡，直到梅菲斯托费勒将其解散为一个动作，或者直到梅菲斯托费勒再次使用这个巢穴动作。

regionalEffects: 梅菲斯托菲勒斯（Mephistopheles）的巢穴所在地区被其魔法扭曲，产生以下一种或多种效果：

items: 在巢穴的6英里范围内，永久的暴风雪肆虐。远程武器攻击检定和感知（{@skill Perception}）检定都有劣势。风会吹灭明火，驱散雾气，在雪地上抹去足迹，并几乎让非魔法手段飞行变得不可能。在暴风雪中，能见度降低至30英尺。在暴风雪中专注于法术的生物必须在其回合结束时通过一次{@dc 10}体质豁免检定，否则将失去对法术的集中，除非生物在元素（例如，冰屋）的庇护下。
在距离巢穴6英里范围内的生物，如果没有受到极寒的保护，必须在每小时结束时进行一次{@dc 20}体质豁免检定，否则会获得一级{@condition exhaustion}。

regionalEffects: 如果梅菲斯托菲勒斯死亡，这些效果会在{@dice 1d10}天内逐渐消失。
